main event: Observers watched a semi-circle glow like a flare travel up diagonally toward the sky until it was out of sight. The object was larger than any falling star they have seen.
interesting points: The object was silent and did not make any sound during the observation.
The observers were unable to estimate the speed or distance of the object.
There were multiple witnesses, including Mr. and Mrs. [REDACTED] and their 3 children.
The observers had not seen a similar object before.
The report was filed on a specific date, but the exact date is redacted.
sighted object: a semi-circle glow like a flare
